faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about My Chronicle

q1.question: How does the chat-to-story conversion work?
q1.answer: As you chat with our AI, your conversation is transformed into narrative prose in real-time. The AI interprets your choices, dialogue, and actions, weaving them into a cohesive story with proper formatting, descriptions, and pacing.

q2.question: Can I go back and change my decisions?
q2.answer: Absolutely! One of the unique features is the ability to create branches at any point in your story. You can go back to previous decision points and explore different paths, creating multiple versions of your tale.

q4.question: What genres are available?
q4.answer: We offer a wide range of genres including fantasy, sci-fi, mystery, romance, horror, adventure, and more. You can also mix genres or create completely custom stories based on your preferences.

q5.question: Can I share my stories with others?
q5.answer: Yes! Pro and Legend members can export their stories as PDF or EPUB files to share with friends or publish elsewhere. You can also share read-only links directly from your library.
